`` Simon Cowell desperately wants Cheryl to be a judge but if that's knocked back by Fox chiefs the next option is to start her as a mentor,'' a source tells The Sun. It would be a way to test how she's received in America. Plus viewers would be able to warm to her first, rather than having her thrust upon them by going straight on the panel. ( Reuters)- Chrysler is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.'') which

Eric Schmidt said never in his wildest dreams did he expect Google to be this successful when he joined 10 years ago. He said that himself, Larry Page and Sergey Brin had acted as a triumvirate over the past decade with all been equally involved in making decisions. He said this policy would continue but change was needed.`` We have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.''
